archimate:Capability.name: Voice Channel Contact
archimate:Capability.documentation: Voice Channel Contact applications provides the means for a customer to speak to a service representative, including the mechanism to query the customer (e.g. ï¿½ IVR) on the nature of their request, and routing of the contact to the best available agent and presentation to the agent of select call information.
